title: How to Make Chocolate Chip Cheesecake Squares

steps.headline: Spray a 9 x 13-inch baking pan with nonstick cooking spray.
Cut one roll of cookie dough into 24 slices.
Add the sliced cookie dough to the prepared baking pan.
steps.description: Layer evenly and then press the cookie dough evenly into the pan.

steps.headline: Beat the cream cheese until creamy.
Add the sugar, eggs and vanilla.
Spread cheesecake filling over cookie dough.
Slice the second roll of cookie dough into 24 slices.
Layer sliced cookie dough over cheesecake filling.

text: Preheat oven to 350 °F (177 °C).  Spray a 9 x 13-inch baking pan with nonstick cooking spray.  Cut one roll of cookie dough into 24 slices.  Add the sliced cookie dough to the prepared baking pan. Layer evenly and then press the cookie dough evenly into the pan. Beat the cream cheese until creamy.  Add the sugar, eggs and vanilla. Beat again until well mixed. Spread cheesecake filling over cookie dough.  Slice the second roll of cookie dough into 24 slices.  Layer sliced cookie dough over cheesecake filling.  Bake 45 minutes.  Finished.
